games_page.title: Video Game Price Guide & Market Values
games_page.intro: Currently tracking {{game_count}} games across {{console_count}} platforms. Our complte video game price guide helps collectors track market values and manage their collections. Explore detailed price lists for Nintendo, PlayStation, Xbox, and SEGA systems. Whether you are buying or selling, use our value guide to stay updated on the latest trends and ensure you get the best deal.

real_data.desc: Our algorithm tracks {{count}} verified sales from eBay and other marketplaces. We don't use asking prices, only what buyers actually pay.

outlier.desc: We automatically exclude damaged items, reproductions, and extreme outliers to ensure the average is representative of the true market value.
